casebody.data:
STETSER
v.
TAP PHARMACEUTICAL PROD. No. 142PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. Marvin K. Blount, III, Greenville, Rebecca C. Blount, Donald E. Haviland, Jr., TerriAnne Benedetto, Kent Williams, Jonathan Shub, Philadelphia, PA. Richard W. Ellis, Matthew W. Sawchak, Raleigh, for Takeda Chemical Industries, Ltd.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of June 2005 by Plaintiff to Withdraw Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2005."
